reviews.review:
Coop horror? Aggressive hide and seek? Asymmetrical multiplayer?
This game is very unique. I can't name any other game quite like it. Is it balanced? No. Is it fun? Yes, very. Just don't care about your rank and everything should be fine. Caring about the slightly competitve nature of this game is a fool's errand.
I liked this game because i really like to play it and i would recommend it to others because i really like to play this game.

its an alright game with a really tough grind and the occasional toxic player
Great game. There is a little bit of a learning curve as far as perks and learning the game, but it's fun solo and even better with friends. Would definitely recommend to anyone

think we did a pretty good job so far

Hay algo para decir que ya no se haya dicho? Es un gran juego con muchas reglas sin escribir. (Para ambos bandos, pero sobre todo para el killer)

No intentes ser killer en High Tier sin el perk Ruina o barbacoa y chile.
Es lo unico que tengo para decir, recomendado sin lugar a dudas, aunque no es el juego para todo el mundo debido a su naturaleza tan particular.

First Match - had a panic attack, didn't know what was happening, absolutely terrified

Now - all about the thrill, fear is gone, still scream like a little girl when chased

8/10 nearly had to change my underwear multiple times
The game is good and fun to play with friend but I think it need to be optimized more.

This is a really good game, but it has a huge number of minuses. The game has a ranking system, so everything should be honest and balanced. But no matter how. You can play at rank 16 and run into killer 5, and that's fine. You play as a killer of rank 16 and you get to the full group of survivors of rank 5. Fine? Go out against the spirit that mori used and makes no noise. And worst of all, that the team does not constantly help, but substitutes you. Community is worse than DotA. Balance 0. Fun 0. And the game is good.
lots of content, lots of fun.

I can barely play the game with the crashing and DC's while still in the loading screen. 

The game is good but wait until they fix it.

The basic game play is simple so you can have fun immediately but if there is so much you can do to improve your performance via perks and game play style that even after 500 hours I am continually learning and still having fun.  Often goes on sale for 50% off so add to wishlist but even at full price this game is 100% worth it.

Good game

What makes this game so great you ask?
Simple concept meeting beautifully designed characters and maps, great events and ALL the feels while playing this awesome game. I highly recommend this masterpiece to anyone who enjoys a high end hide and seek game.
I find this game as a great escape from everyday stress and life. You do have to remember however that it is only a game and try to enjoy it and not let it get do you.
